amendatorysection.para: As used in sections 60-1801 to 60-1808, unless the context otherwise requires, camper unit means any structure designed and intended to be placed on a truck and to provide living quarters and which may be removed from a truck without dismantling or damage when ordinary care is exercised. Camper unit does not include a recreational vehicle as defined in section 60-347, or a mobile home as defined in section 77-3701.
